A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was checking my watch toward the end\, just hoping for the movie to be over soon. People criticize The Force Awakens for being overly derivative\, but at least it felt like Star Wars. This movie did not feel like Star Wars. It felt like some bizarre amalgam of Disney kids movies with inappropriate levels of humor\, pointless and disjointed plot lines\, and sloppy writing of major characters. The Force Awakens built up the story to such impressive heights\, and this movie just crumpled it all up and tossed it in the trash in favor of kiddie humor and nonstop\, exhausting action. This wasn’t Star Wars. It was Disney.
